const common_1 = require("@nestjs/common");
const comments_service_1 = require("./comments.service");
const create_comment_dto_1 = require("./dto/create-comment.dto");
const update_comment_dto_1 = require("./dto/update-comment.dto");
const swagger_1 = require("@nestjs/swagger");
const pagination_options_1 = require("../utils/types/pagination-options");
const platform_express_1 = require("@nestjs/platform-express");
const passport_1 = require("@nestjs/passport");
const articles_service_1 = require("../articles/articles.service");
let CommentsController = class CommentsController {
    constructor(commentsService, articlesService) {
        this.commentsService = commentsService;
        this.articlesService = articlesService;
    }
    async create(req, articleId, createCommentDto, file) {
        createCommentDto.articleId = articleId;
        createCommentDto.writerId = req.user.id;
        const article = this.articlesService.findOne(articleId);
        if (article == null) {
            throw new common_1.ForbiddenException(`${articleId} 번째 글은 삭제되었거나, 없는 글입니다.`);
        }
        return this.commentsService.create(createCommentDto, file);
    }
    findAll(articleId, page) {
        const newPage = new pagination_options_1.IPaginationOptions();
        newPage.page = page;
        return this.commentsService.findByArticleId(articleId, newPage);
    }
    findOne(id) {
        return this.commentsService.findOne(+id);
    }
    async update(id, req, updateCommentDto) {
        const comment = await this.commentsService.findOne(+id);
        if (!comment) {
            throw new common_1.HttpException({
                status: 400,
                errors: {
                    msg: 'comment is not exist',
                },
            }, common_1.HttpStatus.FORBIDDEN);
        }
        if (comment.writerId !== req.user.id) {
            throw new common_1.HttpException({
                status: common_1.HttpStatus.NOT_ACCEPTABLE,
                errors: {
                    msg: 'different user',
                },
            }, common_1.HttpStatus.NOT_ACCEPTABLE);
        }
        return this.commentsService.update(+id, updateCommentDto);
    }
    async remove(id, req) {
        const comment = await this.commentsService.findOne(+id);
        if (comment.writerId !== req.user.id) {
            throw new common_1.HttpException({
                status: common_1.HttpStatus.NOT_ACCEPTABLE,
                errors: {
                    msg: 'different user',
                },
            }, common_1.HttpStatus.NOT_ACCEPTABLE);
        }
        return this.commentsService.remove(+id);
    }
};
